comments.body: As someone who finished their third year in ECE, I will gladly say that ECE in pes (rr campus) has an amazing faculty (except one or two) and the opportunities are amazing.

there's no point in doing ece is you aren't interested in it or if it isn't a tier 1 uni, manipal blr has centralised placements so ig you won't have to worry about that and also the added workload of an electrical branch
I've heard that mit blr has issues with hostels and stuff where everyone other than second years are being sent out. But this might have been fixed.
it was just a rumour, nobody was kicked
